question: Which of the following words is in singular form ?
Choose the correct sentence:
options: All of it depend on you
All of it are depending on you
All of it are depended on you
All of it depends on you
answer: All of it depends on you

question: “A rolling stone gathers no moss” The complex form of the sentence is-
options: Since a stone is rolling, it gathers no moss.
Though a stone rolls, it gathers no moss.
A stone that rolls gathers no moss.
A stone what rolls gathers no moss.
answer: A stone that rolls gathers no moss.

question: A chart was appended to the report. Here ‘appended’ means-
The mother sat vigilantly beside the sick baby. Here ‘vigilantly’ is -
“A new offer of job was alluring . Here ‘alluring’ means-
“who planted this tree here ?” The correct passive voice of this sentence is-
options: By whom was this tree planted here ?
Who the tree had been planted hereby ?
The tree was planted here by whom ?
By whom had the tree been planted here ?
answer: By whom was this tree planted here ?

question: Frailty the name is women. Here ‘Frailty’ is :

Choose the appropriate prepositions in the blank of the following sentence : The family doesn’t feel ____ going outing this season.
Fill in the blank with appropriate use of tense “I couldn’t mend the computer myself, so I ____ at a shop.

The word ‘omnivorous’ means :
Complete the following sentence choosing the appropriate option : It’s raining cats and dogs, so-
options: Make sure you take an umbrella.
answer: Make sure you take an umbrella.
